entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
